entity.name: Samanvay Research and Development Foundation
entity.description: Samanvay Foundation builds and runs products relevant to the social sector

projects.name: Avni
projects.description: Avni is an open source community-service and data collection platform meant for non profits. Over the past years, it has been used across more than 50 different implementations, and has been used to facilitate over 5 million field-worker visits. A few of these projects have gone to state level implementations as well. Avni is registered with the Digital Public Goods Alliance as a DPG (https://app.digitalpublicgoods.net/a/11093)

plans.name: Development hosting
plans.description: This supports hosting for non-production servers for a month

plans.name: Sponsor a Developer
plans.description: This supports costs for one developer for one year

plans.name: City Meetups
plans.description: The idea behind city meetups is to go to cities where there are existing Avni implementations and hold meetings where we invite NGOs who will benefit from the digitisation of their data. The hope is to increase the number of organisations that adopt digitisation through Avni. The funding covers personnel time (2-3 people from Samanvay), travel, food and accommodation and space for five city meetups

plans.name: NGO Visits
plans.description: NGO visits are necessary to understand their challenges and needs from close quarters and will help us build technology solutions which address their concerns. This will cover 5 NGO visits at one team-member per visit.

plans.name: AI Supported Project Implementation
plans.description: AI can be used to improve productivity of software team that delivers projects on Avni platform. This will reduce cost of project implementation and make avni further affordable for NGOs who have lower budgets. This will cover costs for one engineer for one year.

plans.name: Self serviceability
plans.description: Improved self-serviceability of Avni will allow organisations to use their own people to develop application using Avni app designer. This will cover costs for one engineer for one year and one UX designer for 6 months.
